timeline.body: Both `RED` and `red` enums are now commented due to merging order of my [changes](https://github.com/Azure/autorest.java/commit/40cefe2675927b3191f13c131d5aa3b5a1af3156#diff-49b1b1ae6d90a899f8a4f6940b106feeL34) and @weidongxu-microsoft 's [changes](https://github.com/Azure/autorest.java/commit/0800fc5010ef1c4f03ce103864575790a00651da#diff-49b1b1ae6d90a899f8a4f6940b106feeL29). One of the enums should be uncommented.
timeline.bodyText: Both RED and red enums are now commented due to merging order of my changes and @weidongxu-microsoft 's changes. One of the enums should be uncommented.
timeline.bodyHTML: Both RED and red enums are now commented due to merging order of my changes and @weidongxu-microsoft 's changes. One of the enums should be uncommented.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.message: Latest autorest beta defaults to v2 core

timeline.body:
This one seems causing a bit of problem.

Previously genereated enum is such
` SYSTEM_ASSIGNED_USER_ASSIGNED("SystemAssigned, UserAssigned")`

Now it is such
`SYSTEM_ASSIGNED__USER_ASSIGNED("SystemAssigned, UserAssigned")` , one more '`_`'

Any idea what best to circumvent this?
timeline.bodyText:
This one seems causing a bit of problem.
Previously genereated enum is such
 SYSTEM_ASSIGNED_USER_ASSIGNED("SystemAssigned, UserAssigned")
Now it is such
SYSTEM_ASSIGNED__USER_ASSIGNED("SystemAssigned, UserAssigned") , one more '_'
Any idea what best to circumvent this?
